debuff_landing_mechanics.description: Debuff landing combines skill base chance, ACC/RES check, and potential masteries/buffs to determine final success rate.

step_1.name: Skill Base Chance Check
step_1.description: Each debuff has a base chance listed in skill description (e.g., 75% chance to place HP Burn). This check happens FIRST.
step_1.formula: Random roll vs skill base chance
step_1.example: Brogni A1: 75% chance to place HP Burn. 75% of attacks pass this check, 25% fail immediately (no ACC/RES check).

step_2.name: ACC/RES Check
step_2.description: If step 1 passes, ACC/RES check determines if debuff lands or is resisted. Uses formula: (ACC - RES + 200) / 400.
step_2.example: Brogni A1 passed 75% base chance, now checks ACC/RES. With 225 ACC vs 300 RES: (225 - 300 + 200) / 400 = 31.25% land rate. Final HP Burn chance: 75% × 31.25% = 23.4%.

step_3.name: Masteries/Buffs
step_3.description: Sniper mastery (+5% debuff chance) and other buffs apply AFTER step 1. Does NOT affect ACC/RES check.
step_3.notes: Sniper mastery increases base chance (e.g., 75% → 80%), NOT ACC/RES success rate.

combined_success_rate.formula: Skill Base Chance × ACC/RES Success Rate

examples.description: 90% base chance × 72.5% ACC/RES success = 65.25% final land rate per skill use
100% base chance × 37.5% ACC/RES success = 37.5% final land rate (HP Burn, needs more ACC)
50% base chance × 95% ACC/RES success = 47.5% per hit. 2 hits = 1 - (1 - 0.475)² = 72.56% chance at least 1 poison lands.

uptime_calculation.description: Debuff uptime depends on final land rate, skill cooldown, and debuff duration.

examples.notes: With 390 ACC (97.5% ACC/RES success), Stag Knight A2 has ~44% uptime (needs manual micro or buff extension for 100% uptime)
With 350 ACC (62.5% ACC/RES success), Geomancer A3 HP Burn has ~47% uptime. Needs Master Hexer T6 (30% extend) for better uptime.

examples.debuff: HP Burn (Geomancer A3 with Master Hexer)
examples.notes: Master Hexer (30% extend) increases average duration from 3 to 3.3 turns, uptime from 47% to 51.6%.

strategy_1.name: Buff Extension (Lasting Gifts, Champion Skills)
strategy_1.description: Use buff extension masteries or champion skills to extend debuff duration, increasing uptime.
examples: Godseeker Aniri A2 (+1 turn buff extension) extends ally buffs by 1 turn
Lasting Gifts T6 mastery (30% chance +1 turn) extends buffs randomly
Master Hexer T6 mastery (30% chance +1 turn) extends debuffs randomly
strategy_1.notes: Buff extension is RNG-dependent (30% chance for masteries). Champions with guaranteed extension (Godseeker Aniri A2) are more reliable.

strategy_2.name: Multiple Debuff Sources (Redundancy)
strategy_2.description: Use 2+ champions with same debuff to increase uptime through redundancy.
examples: HP Burn: Geomancer A3 + Brogni A1 = higher uptime than single source
Decrease DEF: Stag Knight A2 + alternate champion = 100% uptime possible
strategy_2.notes: Requires team slot investment. Better for critical debuffs (Decrease DEF/ATK).

strategy_3.name: Low Cooldown Skills (2-turn CD or less)
strategy_3.description: Champions with 2-turn CD debuffs can maintain near-100% uptime with high ACC.
examples: 3-turn CD + 3-turn duration + 90% land rate = ~68% uptime (needs extension)
strategy_3.notes: Cooldown reduction (e.g., books, Cycle of Violence mastery) improves uptime significantly.

strategy_4.name: Guaranteed Debuff Placement (100% Base Chance)
strategy_4.description: Champions with 100% base chance debuffs only need ACC/RES check, no RNG on skill.
examples: Geomancer A3: 100% HP Burn base chance (only ACC/RES check)
Some champions have 'cannot be resisted' debuffs (ignores ACC/RES entirely)
strategy_4.notes: 100% base chance reduces variance. Still needs high ACC for reliable landing.

mistake_1.mistake: Confusing skill base chance with ACC/RES success
mistake_1.description: Players assume 75% base chance = 75% land rate. WRONG. Must multiply by ACC/RES success rate.
mistake_1.example: Brogni A1 75% HP Burn with 145 ACC vs 300 RES: 75% × 11.25% = 8.4% final land rate (not 75%).

mistake_2.mistake: Ignoring ACC requirement for 100% base chance skills
mistake_2.description: Players assume 100% base chance = guaranteed landing. WRONG. Still requires ACC/RES check.
mistake_2.example: Geomancer A3 100% HP Burn with 200 ACC vs 300 RES: 100% × 25% = 25% final land rate (not 100%).

mistake_3.mistake: Over-investing in ACC past soft cap
mistake_3.description: Players stack 500+ ACC thinking it helps. WRONG. Diminishing returns past 390 ACC (vs 300 RES), hard cap at 95%.
mistake_3.example: 390 ACC = 72.5% land rate. 500 ACC = 87.5% land rate (capped at 95%). Only +15% gain for +110 ACC (wasted substats).

mistake_4.mistake: Building high RES for Clan Boss
mistake_4.description: Players build 400+ RES for Clan Boss stun mitigation. WRONG. Boss stun is non-resistable, RES is wasted.
mistake_4.example: Mithrala 587 RES vs UNM Clan Boss: RES does NOT help vs stun (non-resistable). 587 RES wasted, should reallocate to DEF/HP/SPD.

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Stag Knight, Geomancer, Brogni land rates), community formulas
metadata.notes: Comprehensive debuff landing mechanics for uptime calculations, ACC optimization, and team synergy analysis
